title: [Large-scale] Digital Technology-Integrated Mathematics Literacy Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and secondary-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones, but PC environments are limited, with a focus on text analysis including specialized math terminology

learning_goals: Using digital tools (smartphone apps/webs), learners can extract core mathematical concepts from texts with 80% accuracy.
In a blended environment, learners can collaboratively complete a project solving math problems by applying digital reading strategies.
Learners can autonomously correct 70% or more of mathematical errors occurring during reading using a digital feedback system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
